abstract: Golf caddies are used to getting fired, but caddie Joe LaCava left fifth-ranked Dustin Johnson to take the bag for Tiger Woods, who unceremoniously dumped Steve Williams, his caddie of 12 years.
snippet: They are used to getting fired, but caddie Joe LaCava left the fifth-ranked Dustin Johnson to take the bag for Tiger Woods.
lead_paragraph: They are used to getting fired, but caddie Joe LaCava left the fifth-ranked Dustin Johnson to take the bag for Tiger Woods.

headline.main: A Reality for Caddies: Pink Slips on Greens
headline.print_headline: A Reality for Caddies: Pink Slips on Greens
headline.seo: Job Security? Not for PGA’s Caddies
